Question
========
What is the primary purpose of the first icon (file explorer) on the Activity Bar?

Answerlist
----------
* Quickly open, create, and navigate project files
* Display plots and HTML widgets
* Show workspace variables and history
* Configure extensions and their settings

Solution
========
The file explorer view lets you browse and manage project files from the left Activity Bar.
